resumeAbout: As a front-end developer, Nelson seeks collaborative environments where thoughtful development and beauty are the goal. When he's not coding or playing music, Nelson is protecting the world from his overly affectionate rescue pups Molly and Dolly.

As a musician, Nelson Foltz has worked with such artists as Barry White, Steely Dan, Aretha Franklin, Spoon, Roberta Flack, The Colorado Symphony, Debbie Gibson, Josh Ritter, Tony Bennett, Juliette Commagere, Dave Liebman, Joachim Cooder, Rebecca Martin, Tony Williams, and Maria Schneider. His credits include music for film, television and radio as well as performing in the orchestra for numerous broadway shows including The Lion King, Fosse, and Hairspray.
